readingKunHtml: あきら, あき, あさ, あした, ただし
sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>dawn</radical> radical and the <kanji>dawn</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Dawn</kanji> is <reading>dawn</reading> (<ja>だん</ja>)! It's also a great time to get a <reading>tan</reading> (<ja>たん</ja>). The sun is bright at dawn, but not so much that it will send skin cancer rays into you.
readingInfo: Imagine getting a tan at dawn. Ahh. Relaxing and warm.
